SENT.plain: One hundred four histologically proven malignant tumors of the eye and orbit in children seen in Guinness Eye Clinic, Kaduna, Nigeria between 1975 and 1982 are presented
Retinoblastoma and Burkitt's lymphoma account for the majority of the tumors
The data are compared with those from Ibadan, Nigeria
Burkitt's lymphoma occurs less frequently in Kaduna, whereas the incidence of retinoblastoma is almost the same
Chloroma, which was not seen in Ibadan, accounted for 2.9% of the current series
Factors that may be contributory to the observed differences are discussed
